awd_titl_txt: Postdoctoral Research Fellowship in Plant Biology
awd_abstract_narration: This award funds a postdoctoral research fellowship in plant                    biology for two years.  The project entitled "Characterization of               potyviral RNA replication" is to be carried out in the                          laboratories of John Shaw at University of Kentucky.  The Ph.D.                 training of this Fellow was in the area of light regulation of                  gene expression in barley.  The focus of the postdoctoral project               is the effects of viral (tobacco vein mottling virus) gene                      expression on chloroplast activities.                                                                                                                           The postdoctoral fellowships in plant biology are designed to                   increase the number of outstanding young investigators in plant                 biology.
